column4: Question: But first of all I must say that I'm now using Ubuntu as my primary OS for the first time and I don't regret it so far...
same here.. how long has it been your primary OS?
My question is: what is the best file system to share a drive between WinOS and Linux, should I use FAT32? Right now I use NTFS but I read that writing to this is still in beta (not always statble).
